body.name: Dove Advanced Care Antiperspirant Deodorant Stick for Women, Revive, for 48 Hour Protection And Soft And Comfortable Underarms, 2.6 oz, 2 Count
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 2 hrs 49 mins
features: EFFECTIVE PROTECTION AND KIND TO SKIN. Dove Advanced Care Revive Antiperspirant Deodorant Stick keeps your underarms dry and odor free for up to 48 hours while being kind to your skin
SOFT AND COMFORTABLE UNDERARMS. Our antiperspirant deodorant for women, containing 1/4 moisturizers with natural oil, cares for your underarm skin
ALCOHOL FREE FORMULA. The 0 percent alcohol ethanol formula of our antiperspirant stick helps skin recover from underarm irritation that shaving can cause
KEEPS YOU FRESH. Fresh and caring scent in this deodorant that opens with a crisp, zesty, fruity freshness on top of a delicate blend of roses, lily, orchid flowers, and soft vanilla
FREES YOU FROM UNDERARM WORRIES. This women's deodorant stick protects and cares for your skin so that you can be free from underarm inhibitions and live beautifully unselfconsciously
CERTIFIED CRUELTY FREE. Globally, Dove does not test on animals and is certified cruelty free by PETA
body.description: Looking for effective sweat and odor protection that's also gentle on underarm skin. Dove Advanced Care Revive Antiperspirant Deodorant Stick gives you up to 48 hours of long lasting protection to keep you feeling comfortable all day. A crisp, fresh, fruity scent with a blend of florals – it’s the perfect morning wake up call. Our formula, containing Dove's signature 1/4 moisturizers with natural oil and 0 percent alcohol ethanol, takes gentle care of your underarms. Our kind to skin formula helps skin recover from shaving irritation, leaving your underarms feeling soft and comfortable. Designed with skin in mind, this pampering deodorant for sensitive skin delivers effective protection in an ultra caring way. Use this antiperspirant deodorant stick regularly to enjoy comfortable and healthy feeling underarms. For best results, apply this Dove antiperspirant deodorant to dry skin after showering and enjoy fresh, comfortably dry skin from morning to night. Dove is certified cruelty free by PETA because we believe that real beauty is cruelty free. We’re on a mission to help women raise their self esteem because we believe beauty should be a source of confidence, not anxiety. Dove Antiperspirant Deodorants deliver effective underarm protection and are kind to skin, so women can be free of underarm inhibitions and live beautifully unselfconsciously.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Effective Protection Dove knows that underarm skin needs kindness as well as protection. That’s why our antiperspirant deodorant gives you up to 48 hours of sweat and odor protection so you can stay cool and dry all day long. Kind to Skin Enriched with our signature 1/4 moisturizers with natural oil, the alcohol-free formula of this antiperspirant deodorant works to nourish your delicate underarm skin, leaving you with soft and more comfortable underarms. Raising Self-Esteem At Dove, our vision is of a world where beauty is a source of confidence, and not anxiety. We are on a mission to help 1/4 of a billion young people build self-esteem from 2004 to 2030. Certified Cruelty-Free Since 2018, Dove has been globally accredited "Cruelty-Free" by the animal rights organization PETA (People for the Ethical Treatment of Animals) in recognition of the Dove global commitment to permanently end tests on animals everywhere in the world.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works well, high-rated scent in my opinion
reviews.reviewText: I love the scent. In my opinion, it has the best scent of any deodorant I've ever purchased. The longevity is comparable to many other similar deodorants such as Degree, for example. I don't have sensitive skin, so I can't comment on that aspect of this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this deodorant.
reviews.reviewText: I've been using this deodorant for years. I was frustrated when they changed the name from pomegranate to Revive because it took me a while to figure out which one was the right one again, so I kept buying ones I didn't like as much. Clean fresh scent. Great for my sensitive skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smells good and does the job! I love it!!
reviews.reviewText: I was tired of my same old deodorant, and this smells so good but not too much and last a lot longer than what I was using before. ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Does it smell good?
reviews.reviewText: It does but it's fragile and doesn't last for a long period of time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Works like I want deodorant to work

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This was a great item. It feels really good going on and lasts for a long time. Will buy again.

Ningún otro desodorante me ayuda como este, generalmente los compro en usa, porque en México no están a la venta, así que encontrarlos en Amazon, fue un sueño!!!! No irritan la piel, ayudan mucho con la transpiración y malos olores, ningún desodorante me funciona, así que para gente con problemas con excesiva sudoración, ampliamente recomendado.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on July 3, 2018
reviews.reviewText: Great product, not found a better antiperspirant any where
